resources.string: Contacts for people to forward sms
Channel for people to forward sms
This app needs access to your camera so you can take pictures.
This app needs access to your location and contacts to know where and who you are.
This app needs access to your sms to process sms content.
This app needs access to your internet to post messages.
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
